name: Lucky Ball
description:
Feel lucky enough?

Try getting a Luck Factor of 20 in this fun platformer Lucky Ball game.

The gameplay easy. Choose a platform to stay on when the spikes randomly pop out of some platforms. The longer you stay safe, the luckier you are. At max only 3 platforms will be safe and at  min only one.

Lucky enough to reach a Luck Factor of 20 ?
